trans-unit.source: Often, you will just want to fetch() one or more requests, then add the result straight to your cache. In such cases you are better off using Cache.add()/Cache.addAll(), as they are shorthand functions for one or more of these operations.

trans-unit.source: On IE 6-8 the event model is different. Event listeners are attached with the non-standard EventTarget.attachEvent method. In this model, the event object has a Event.srcElement property, instead of the target property, and it has the same semantics as event.target.
trans-unit.target: 在IE 6-8上，事件模型有所不同。事件侦听器附带有非标准的 EventTarget.attachEvent 方法。在此模型中，事件对象具有 Event.srcElement 属性（而不是 target 属性），并且具有与 event.target 相同的语义。

trans-unit.source: On IE, this property returns undefined.
trans-unit.target: 在IE上,该属性返回未定义。

trans-unit.source: On Internet Explorer 6 through 8, the event model is different. Event listeners are attached with the non-standard EventTarget.attachEvent method. In this model, there is no equivalent to event.currentTarget and this is the global object. One solution to emulate the event.currentTarget feature is to wrap your handler in a function calling the handler using Function.prototype.call with the element as a first argument. This way, this will be the expected value.
trans-unit.target: 在Internet Explorer 6到8中，事件模型是不同的。事件侦听器附带有非标准的 EventTarget.attachEvent 方法。在此模型中，没有等效于 event.currentTarget 的对象， this 是全局对象。模拟 event.currentTarget 功能的一种解决方案是将处理程序包装在使用 Function.prototype.call 并将处理程序作为第一个参数的调用处理程序的函数中。这样， this 将是期望值。

trans-unit.target: 在Linux(GTK)上,不支持第四个按钮和第五个按钮。此外,一个鼠标移动事件总是在这个属性值中包含释放按钮的信息。

See Pending and current descriptions in WebRTC connectivity for details on this algorithm and why it's used.
trans-unit.target: 从更基本的 RTCPeerConnection.pendingRemoteDescription 如果该属性不为 null ，则返回的值为RTCPeerConnection.pendingRemoteDescription的值。否则，返回 RTCPeerConnection.currentRemoteDescription 的值。见挂起和当前的描述中的WebRTC连接的详细信息，这种算法以及为什么它的使用。

trans-unit.source: On an outermost <svg> element, this float attribute indicates the current scale factor relative to the initial view to take into account user magnification and panning operations. DOM attributes currentScale and currentTranslate are equivalent to the 2x3 matrix [a b c d e f] = [currentScale 0 0 currentScale currentTranslate.x currentTranslate.y]. If "magnification" is enabled (i.e., zoomAndPan="magnify"), then the effect is as if an extra transformation were placed at the outermost level on the SVG document fragment (i.e., outside the outermost <svg> element).
trans-unit.target: 在最外面的 <svg> 元素上，此float属性指示相对于初始视图的当前比例因子，以考虑用户放大和平移操作。 DOM属性 currentScale 和 currentTranslate 等效于2x3矩阵 [a b c d e f] = [currentScale 0 0 currentScale currentTranslate.x currentTranslate.y] 。如果启用了“放大”功能（即 zoomAndPan="magnify" ），则效果就像在SVG文档片段的最外层（即，最外层 <svg> 元素之外）上进行了额外的转换。

trans-unit.source: On return, charging indicates whether or not the battery, which is a BatteryManager object, is currently being charged; if the battery is charging, this value is true. Otherwise, the value is false.

trans-unit.source: On return, currentStyleSheetSet indicates the name of the style sheet set currently in use. You can also set the current style sheet set using this property.
trans-unit.target: 返回时， currentStyleSheetSet 指示当前正在使用的样式表集的名称。您也可以使用此属性设置当前样式表集。

trans-unit.source: On return, exampleSocket.readyState is CONNECTING. The readyState will become OPEN once the connection is ready to transfer data.
trans-unit.target: 返回时， exampleSocket.readyState 为 CONNECTING 。一旦连接准备好传输数据， readyState 将变为 OPEN 。

trans-unit.source: On return, intViewportHeight is the height of the browser window's viewport.
trans-unit.target: 返回时， intViewportHeight 是浏览器窗口的视口的高度。

trans-unit.source: On return, lastStyleSheetSet indicates the style sheet set that was most recently set. If the current style sheet set has not been changed by setting document.selectedStyleSheetSet, the returned value is null.
trans-unit.target: 返回时， lastStyleSheetSet 指示最近设置的样式表集。如果尚未通过设置 document.selectedStyleSheetSet 更改当前样式表集，则返回值为 null 。

trans-unit.source: On return, level is a number representing the system's battery charge level scaled to a value between 0.0 and 1.0. A value of 0 means the battery, which is a BatteryManager object, is empty and the system is about to be suspended. A value of 1.0 means the battery is full. A value of 1.0 is also returned if the implementation isn't able to determine the battery charge level or if the system is not battery-powered.
trans-unit.target: 返回时， level 是一个数字，代表系统的电池充电水平，将其缩放到0.0到1.0之间的值。0表示A值 battery ，这是一个 BatteryManager 对象，是空的，该系统是将被暂停。值1.0表示电池已充满。如果实现无法确定电池电量或系统不是由电池供电，则还将返回1.0值。

trans-unit.source: On return, outWindowHeight contains the height of the outside of the window.
trans-unit.target: 返回时， outWindowHeight 包含窗口外部的高度。

trans-unit.source: On return, outWindowWidth is the width of the outside of the window.
trans-unit.target: 返回时， outWindowWidth 是窗口外部的宽度。

trans-unit.source: On return, preferredStyleSheetSet indicates the author's preferred style sheet set. This is determined from the order of style sheet declarations and the Default-Style HTTP header.
trans-unit.target: 返回时， preferredStyleSheetSet 指示作者的首选样式表集。这是由样式表声明和 Default-Style HTTP标头的顺序确定的。

trans-unit.source: On return, sets is a list of style sheet sets that are available.
trans-unit.target: 返回时， sets 是可用的样式表集合的列表。

trans-unit.source: On return, time is the remaining time in seconds until the battery, which is a BatteryManager object, is fully charged, or 0 if the battery is already fully charged. If the battery is currently discharging, this value is Infinity.
trans-unit.target: 在返回时， time 是以秒为单位的剩余时间，直到 battery ，这是一个 BatteryManager 对象，被完全充电，或0，如果电池已经被充满电。如果电池当前正在放电，则此值为 Infinity 。

trans-unit.source: On return, time is the remaining time in seconds until the battery, which is a BatteryManager object, is fully discharged and the system will suspend. This value is Infinity if the battery is currently charging rather than discharging, or if the system is unable to report the remaining discharging time.
trans-unit.target: 返回时， time 是直到 battery （即 BatteryManager 对象）完全放电并且系统将挂起之前的剩余时间（以秒为单位）。如果电池当前正在充电而不是放电，或者系统无法报告剩余的放电时间，则此值为 Infinity 。

trans-unit.source: On return, absolute is true if the orientation data in instanceOfDeviceOrientationEvent is provided as the difference between the Earth's coordinate frame and the device's coordinate frame, or false if the orientation data is being provided in reference to some arbitrary, device-determined coordinate frame.
trans-unit.target: 返回时，如果将 instanceOfDeviceOrientationEvent 中的方向数据作为地球坐标系和设备坐标系之间的差值提供，则 true 为 absolute ；如果参考某些任意的设备确定的坐标系提供方向数据，则为 false 。

trans-unit.source: On the other hand, if the tone buffer is empty, our example is designed to disconnect the call. This is done by stopping each stream on both the caller and the receiver by iterating over each RTCPeerConnection's track list (as returned by its getTracks() method) and calling each track's stop() method.
trans-unit.target: 另一方面，如果音频缓冲区为空，则我们的示例旨在断开呼叫。通过在每个 RTCPeerConnection 的轨道列表（由其 getTracks() 方法返回）上进行迭代并调用每个轨道的 stop() 方法，可以在调用方和接收方上停止每个流，从而完成此操作。

trans-unit.source: On the other hand, if you're trying to emulate WebKit's behavior on Gecko, you need to place the element you want to present inside another element, which you'll make fullscreen instead, and use CSS rules to adjust the inner element to match the appearance you want.
trans-unit.target: 另一方面,如果你想模仿WebKit在Gecko上的行为,你需要把你想呈现的元素放在另一个元素里面,你会把它变成全屏,并使用CSS规则来调整内部元素来匹配你想要的外观。

Notice that the playback panel doesn't have autoplay set (so the playback doesn't start as soon as media arrives), and it has controls set, which tells it to show the user controls to play, pause, and so forth.

trans-unit.source: On the software side, Valve has created SteamVR software, which is compatible with the VIVE and other solutions, and serves to provide access to software, such as a usable VR UI.
trans-unit.target: 在软件方面，Valve已创建了SteamVR软件，该软件与VIVE和其他解决方案兼容，并用于提供对软件（例如可用的VR UI）的访问。

trans-unit.source: On the software side, Valve has created SteamVR software, which is compatible with the VIVE and other solutions, and serves to provide access to software, such as a usable VR UI.

On to the end of the function call, we chain the promise then() method, which contains two functions — the first one is executed when the promise successfully resolves, and the second is called when the promise is rejected. In the resolved case, we display the image inside myImage and append it to the body (it’s argument is the request.response contained inside the promise’s resolve method); in the rejected case we return an error to the console.
trans-unit.target: 在函数调用的最后，我们链接了promise then() 方法，该方法包含两个函数-第一个函数在promise成功解析后执行，第二个函数在promise被拒绝时调用。在已解决的情况下，我们将图像显示在 myImage 内并将其附加到主体（它的参数是promise的 resolve 方法中包含的 request.response ）；在被拒绝的情况下，我们将错误返回到控制台。

trans-unit.source: Once getData() has finished running, we start the audio source playing with start(0), then disable the play button so it can't be clicked again when it is already playing (this would cause an error.)
trans-unit.target: 一旦 getData() 完成运行，我们将使用 start(0) 启动音频源的播放，然后禁用播放按钮，这样在播放时就无法再次单击它（这会导致错误。）

trans-unit.source: Once getUserMedia has created a media stream successfully, you create a new Media Recorder instance with the MediaRecorder() constructor and pass it the stream directly. This is your entry point into using the MediaRecorder API — the stream is now ready to be captured into a Blob, in the default encoding format of your browser.
trans-unit.target: 一旦 getUserMedia 成功创建了媒体流，就可以使用 MediaRecorder() 构造函数创建一个新的Media Recorder实例，并将其直接传递给该流。这是使用MediaRecorder API的切入点-现在可以使用浏览器的默认编码格式将流捕获到 Blob 中。

trans-unit.source: Once options is ready, we create the new observer, calling the IntersectionObserver() constructor, specifying a function to be called when intersection crosses one of our thresholds, handleIntersect(), and our set of options. We then call observe() on the returned observer, passing into it the desired target element.
trans-unit.target: 一旦 options 准备好了，我们创建了新的观察员，调用 IntersectionObserver() 构造函数，指定一个函数被调用时，路口穿越我们的其中一个阈值， handleIntersect() ，和我们的设置选项。然后，我们在返回的观察者上调用 observe() ，将所需的目标元素传递给它。

trans-unit.source: Once setLocalDescription()'s fulfillment handler has run, the ICE agent begins sending icecandidate events to the RTCPeerConnection, one for each potential configuration it discovers. Our handler for the icecandidate event is responsible for transmitting the candidates to the other peer.
trans-unit.target: 一旦 setLocalDescription() 的实现处理程序运行，ICE代理便开始将 icecandidate 事件发送到 RTCPeerConnection ，它针对发现的每个潜在配置发送一个事件。我们针对 icecandidate 事件的处理程序负责将候选人发送给其他同龄人。

trans-unit.source: Once a Response is retrieved, there are a number of methods available to define what the body content is and how it should be handled (see Body).
trans-unit.target: 检索到 Response ，可以使用多种方法来定义主体内容以及应如何处理它（请参见 Body ）。

trans-unit.source: Once a Range is created, you need to set its boundary points before you can make use of most of its methods.
trans-unit.target: 一旦 Range 被创建，你需要设置它的边界点之前，你可以利用它的大多数方法。

trans-unit.source: Once a WebGL extension is enabled, you are able to use the methods, properties or constants that this extension object provides.
trans-unit.target: 启用WebGL扩展后,您就可以使用该扩展对象提供的方法、属性或常量。

trans-unit.source: Once a timer's code has finished running, the duration of time it took to execute is subtracted from its window's timeout budget.
trans-unit.target: 一旦定时器的代码运行完毕,它的执行时间就会从其窗口的超时预算中减去。

trans-unit.source: Once all of the shaders are compiled, the program is linked using gl.linkProgram().
trans-unit.target: 编译完所有着色器后，将使用 gl.linkProgram() 链接程序。

trans-unit.source: Once all of the transactions have completed, the database connection is closed.
trans-unit.target: 一旦所有事务完成,数据库连接就会关闭。

trans-unit.source: Once all the gain nodes are created, we create the ConstantSourceNode, constantNode. We connect its output to the gainAudioParam on both gainNode2 and gainNode3, and we start the constant node running by calling its start() method; now it's sending the value 0.5 to the two gain nodes' values, and any change to constantNode.offset will automatically set the gain of both gainNode2 and gainNode3 (affecting their audio inputs as expected).
trans-unit.target: 创建所有增益节点后，我们将创建 ConstantSourceNode ， constantNode 。我们连接其输出到 gain AudioParam 两个 gainNode2 和 gainNode3 ，我们开始不断的节点通过调用其运行 start() 方法;现在它将值0.5发送到两个增益节点的值，对 constantNode.offset 的任何更改将自动设置 gainNode2 和 gainNode3 的增益（如预期那样影响它们的音频输入）。

trans-unit.source: Once all three oscillators have been created, they're started by calling each one's ConstantSourceNode.start() method in turn, and playing is set to true to track that the tones are playing.
trans-unit.target: 一旦创建了所有三个振荡器，就可以通过依次调用每个人的 ConstantSourceNode.start() 方法来启动它们，并将 playing 设置为 true 以跟踪音调正在播放。

trans-unit.source: Once applied, the number of samples is reduced to its initial numbers. This leads to better results by avoiding some aliasing, but comes at the expense of a lower precision shaping curve.
trans-unit.target: 一旦应用,采样数就会减少到其初始数。这样可以避免一些混叠,从而得到更好的结果,但代价是降低了整形曲线的精度。

trans-unit.source: Once both the caller's and the receiver's media tracks are all stopped, we pause the <audio> element and set its srcObject to null. This detaches the audio stream from the <audio> element.
trans-unit.target: 一旦呼叫者和接收者的媒体轨道都停止，我们将暂停 <audio> 元素并将其 srcObject 设置为 null 。这会将音频流与 <audio> 元素分离。

trans-unit.source: Once captured, the event object gives access to different kinds of information:
trans-unit.target: 一旦被捕获,事件对象就可以访问不同种类的信息。

trans-unit.source: Once captured, the event object gives access to the light intensity expressed in lux through the DeviceLightEvent.value property.
trans-unit.target: 一旦捕获，事件对象就可以通过 DeviceLightEvent.value 属性访问以勒克斯表示的光强度。

trans-unit.source: Once media has been selected and loading is ready to begin, the loadstart event is delivered.
trans-unit.target: 一旦选择了介质并且可以开始加载， loadstart 事件。

trans-unit.source: Once mouse capture is released, mouse events will no longer all be directed to the element on which capture is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 一旦鼠标捕捉被释放,鼠标事件将不再全部指向启用捕捉的元素。

trans-unit.source: Once per pass through the browser's event loop, each IntersectionObserver checks to see if any of its target elements have passed through any of the observer's intersection ratio thresholds. For each observer, a list of targets that have done so is compiled, and sent to the observer's callback as an array of IntersectionObserverEntry objects. Our callback, intersectionCallback(), looks like this:
trans-unit.target: 每次通过浏览器的事件循环一次后，每个 IntersectionObserver 都会检查其目标元素是否已通过观察者的相交比率阈值。对于每个观察者，将编译已执行此操作的目标列表，并将其作为 IntersectionObserverEntry 对象的数组发送到观察者的回调中。我们的回调函数 intersectionCallback() 如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Once successfully registered, a service worker can and will be terminated when idle to conserve memory and processor power. An active service worker is automatically restarted to respond to events, such as ServiceWorkerGlobalScope.onfetch or ServiceWorkerGlobalScope.onmessage.
trans-unit.target: 成功注册后，服务工作者可以并且将在空闲时被终止，以节省内存和处理器电量。活动的服务程序会自动重新启动以响应事件，例如 ServiceWorkerGlobalScope.onfetch 或 ServiceWorkerGlobalScope.onmessage 。

trans-unit.source: Once that succeeds, the answer is sent to the signaling server using whatever protocol you see fit.
trans-unit.target: 一旦成功,答案就会使用你认为合适的任何协议发送到信令服务器。

trans-unit.source: Once that's done, applyConstraints() is called on the audio track (if there is one) to apply the new audio constraints. If this succeeds, the contents of the audio track's current settings box are updated based on the result of calling its getSettings() method.
trans-unit.target: 完成后，在音轨上调用 applyConstraints() （如果有的话）以应用新的音频约束。如果成功，则基于调用其 getSettings() 方法的结果来更新音轨当前设置框的内容。

trans-unit.source: Once that's done, insertAdjacentHTML() is used to insert the <input> element into the DOM.
trans-unit.target: 完成之后，使用 insertAdjacentHTML() 将 <input> 元素插入DOM。

trans-unit.source: Once that's done, we create a JavaScript array containing the position for each vertex of the square plane. This is then converted into an array of floats and passed into the gl object's bufferData() method to establish the vertex positions for the object.
trans-unit.target: 完成后，我们将创建一个JavaScript数组，其中包含正方形平面每个顶点的位置。然后将其转换为浮点数组，并传递至 gl 对象的 bufferData() 方法中，以建立对象的顶点位置。

trans-unit.source: Once the NodeList of matching elements is returned, you can examine it just like any array. If the array is empty (that is, its length property is 0), then no matches were found.
trans-unit.target: 返回匹配元素的 NodeList 后，您可以像检查任何数组一样对其进行检查。如果数组为空（即其 length 属性为0），则找不到匹配项。

trans-unit.source: Once the RTCPeerConnection is open, the datachannel event is sent to the remote to complete the process of opening the data channel; this invokes our receiveChannelCallback() method, which looks like this:
trans-unit.target: 一旦 RTCPeerConnection 是开放的， datachannel 事件被发送到远程完成打开所述数据信道的处理; 这将调用我们的 receiveChannelCallback() 方法，如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Once the PaymentRequest object has been created, you call the PaymentRequest.show() method on it to initiate the payment request. This returns a promise that fulfills with a PaymentResponse object if the payment is successful:
trans-unit.target: 一旦 PaymentRequest 对象被创建时，可以调用 PaymentRequest.show() 方法就可以发起支付请求。如果付款成功，这将返回一个使用 PaymentResponse 对象满足的承诺：

trans-unit.source: Once the RTCPeerConnection has been created, we request access to the user's camera and microphone by calling MediaDevices.getUserMedia(), which is exposed to us through the Navigator.mediaDevices.getUserMedia property. When this succeeds, fulfilling the returned promise, our then handler is executed. It receives, as input, a MediaStream object representing the stream with audio from the user's microphone and video from their webcam.
trans-unit.target: 一旦 RTCPeerConnection 已经建立，我们通过调用请求访问用户的摄像头和麦克风 MediaDevices.getUserMedia() ，它是通过暴露给我们 Navigator.mediaDevices.getUserMedia 财产。成功完成后，将履行返回的Promise， then 执行我们的then处理程序。它接收作为输入的 MediaStream 对象作为输入，其中包含来自用户麦克风的音频和来自其网络摄像头的视频。

trans-unit.source: Once the HTML for the report is generated, it is injected into the element whose class is "stats-box" by setting its innerHTML property.
trans-unit.target: 生成报告的HTML后，可以通过设置它的 innerHTML 属性将其注入到类为 "stats-box" 的元素中。

trans-unit.source: Once the ICE session is complete, the configuration that's currently in effect is the final one, unless an ICE reset occurs.
trans-unit.target: 一旦ICE会话完成,当前有效的配置就是最终配置,除非发生ICE重置。

trans-unit.source: Once the amount of directional lighting is computed, we can generate the lighting value by taking the ambient light and adding in the product of the directional light's color and the amount of directional lighting to provide. As a result, we now have an RGB value that will be used by the fragment shader to adjust the color of each pixel we render.
trans-unit.target: 一旦计算出定向照明的数量,我们就可以通过取环境光并加入定向光的颜色和要提供的定向照明数量的乘积来生成照明值。结果,我们现在有了一个RGB值,它将被片段着色器用来调整我们渲染的每个像素的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Once the answer has been created using myPeerConnection.createAnswer(), the description of the local end of the connection is set to the answer's SDP by calling myPeerConnection.setLocalDescription(), then the answer is transmitted through the signaling server to the caller to let them know what the answer is
trans-unit.target: 一旦使用 myPeerConnection.createAnswer() 创建了答案，就可以通过调用 myPeerConnection.setLocalDescription() 将连接本地端的描述设置为答案的SDP ，然后将答案通过信令服务器传输给调用方，以使他们知道答案是什么

trans-unit.source: Once the answer has been created, it's passed into the remoteConnection by calling RTCPeerConnection.setLocalDescription(). That establishes the remote's end of the connection (which, to the remote peer, is its local end. This stuff can be confusing, but you get used to it.
trans-unit.target: 创建答案后，将通过调用 RTCPeerConnection.setLocalDescription() 将其传递到remoteConnection中。这样就建立了远程的连接端（到远程对等方是本地端。这种东西可能会令人困惑，但是您已经习惯了。）

trans-unit.source: Once the caller has created its RTCPeerConnection, created a media stream, and added its tracks to the connection as shown in Starting a call, the browser will deliver a negotiationneeded event to the RTCPeerConnection to indicate that it's ready to begin negotiation with the other peer. Here's our code for handling the negotiationneeded event:
trans-unit.target: 调用者创建其 RTCPeerConnection ，创建媒体流并将其轨道添加到连接后，如开始呼叫中所示，浏览器将向 RTCPeerConnection 传递一个需要 negotiationneeded 事件，以表明它已准备好开始与另一个对等方进行协商。这是用于处理 negotiationneeded 事件的代码：

trans-unit.source: Once the canvas contains the captured image, we convert it to PNG format by calling HTMLCanvasElement.toDataURL() on it; finally, we call photo.setAttribute() to make our captured still box display the image.
trans-unit.target: 画布包含捕获的图像后，我们可以通过在其上调用 HTMLCanvasElement.toDataURL() 将其转换为PNG格式。最后，我们调用 photo.setAttribute() 以使捕获的静止图像框显示图像。

trans-unit.source: Once the configuration object has been created, it is passed into the RTCPeerConnection() constructor to use it as the configuration for the new peer connection.
trans-unit.target: 创建配置对象后，会将其传递到 RTCPeerConnection() 构造函数中，以将其用作新对等连接的配置。

trans-unit.source: Once the connection is established (that is, readyState is OPEN), exampleSocket.protocol will tell you which protocol the server selected.
trans-unit.target: 建立连接后（即 readyState 为 OPEN ）， exampleSocket.protocol 将告诉您服务器选择了哪种协议。

trans-unit.source: Once the connection is opened, incoming messages from the server are delivered to your code in the form of message events.
trans-unit.target: 打开连接后，来自服务器的传入消息将以 message 事件的形式传递到您的代码中。

trans-unit.source: Once the current item is in the list, the item's isDirectory property is checked. If the item is a directory, we need to recurse into that directory. The first step is to create a FileSystemDirectoryReader to handle fetching the directory's contents. That's done by calling the item's createReader() method. Then a new <ul> is created and appended to the parent list; this will contain the directory's contents in the next level down in the list's hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: 一旦当前项目在列表中，就检查该项目的 isDirectory 属性。如果项目是目录，则需要递归到该目录。第一步是创建一个 FileSystemDirectoryReader 来处理获取目录的内容。这是通过调用项目的 createReader() 方法来完成的。然后，创建一个新的 <ul> 并将其附加到父列表中。这将在列表层次结构的下一级包含目录的内容。

trans-unit.source: Once the drag is complete, a dragend event is fired at the source of the drag (the same element that received the dragstart event). This event will fire if the drag was successful[1] or if it was cancelled. However, you can use the dropEffect property to determine what drop operation occurred.
trans-unit.target: 拖动完成后，将在拖动源（接收到 dragstart 事件的同一元素）处触发 dragend 事件。如果拖动成功[1]或取消，则会触发此事件。但是，可以使用 dropEffect 属性确定发生了什么放置操作。

trans-unit.source: Once the keyboard has been constructed, we scroll the note "B" in octave 5 into view; this has the effect of ensuring that middle-C is visible along with its surrounding keys.
trans-unit.target: 一旦键盘构建完成,我们将八度5的音符 "B "滚动到视图中;这样做的效果是确保中间的C和它周围的键都能看到。

trans-unit.source: Once the new cue is created, it needs to be added to a TextTrack. Once added, this cue will be drawn from seconds 2 to 3 and will show the text Cool text to be displayed.
trans-unit.target: 创建新提示后，需要将其添加到 TextTrack 中。添加后，此提示将从2秒到3秒绘制，并显示要显示的文字 Cool text to be displayed 。

trans-unit.source: Once the node has been created, you can't change its coefficients.
trans-unit.target: 一旦节点被创建,你就不能改变它的系数。

trans-unit.source: Once the path has been created, you can stroke or fill the path to render it.
trans-unit.target: 一旦创建了路径,你就可以对路径进行描边或填充来渲染它。

trans-unit.source: Once the payment flow has been triggered using PaymentRequest.show() and the promise resolves successfully, the PaymentResponse object available inside the fulfilled promise (instrumentResponse above) will have a PaymentResponse.details property that will contain response details. This has to conform to the structure defined by the BasicCardResponse dictionary, and may look something like this:
trans-unit.target: 一旦使用 PaymentRequest.show() 触发了付款流程并且成功解决了承诺， PaymentResponse 兑现承诺中可用的PaymentResponse对象（上面的 instrumentResponse ）将具有 PaymentResponse.details 属性，该属性将包含响应详细信息。这必须符合 BasicCardResponse 词典定义的结构，并且可能看起来像这样：

trans-unit.source: Once the payment flow has been triggered using PaymentRequest.show() and the promise resolves successfully, the PaymentResponse object available inside the fulfilled promise (instrumentResponse above) will have a PaymentResponse.details property that will contain response details. This has to conform to the structure defined by the BasicCardResponse dictionary, and may look something like this:
trans-unit.target: 一旦使用 PaymentRequest.show() 触发了付款流程并且成功解决了承诺， PaymentResponse 兑现承诺中可用的PaymentResponse对象（上面的 instrumentResponse ）将具有 PaymentResponse.details 属性，该属性将包含响应详细信息。这必须符合 BasicCardResponse 词典定义的结构，并且可能看起来像这样：

trans-unit.source: Once the payment flow has been triggered using PaymentRequest.show() and the promise resolves successfully, the PaymentResponse object available inside the fulfilled promise (instrumentResponse above) will have a PaymentResponse.details property that will contain response details. This has to conform to the structure defined by the BasicCardResponse dictionary, and may look something like this:
trans-unit.target: 一旦使用 PaymentRequest.show() 触发了付款流程并且成功解决了承诺， PaymentResponse 兑现承诺中可用的PaymentResponse对象（上面的 instrumentResponse ）将具有 PaymentResponse.details 属性，该属性将包含响应详细信息。这必须符合 BasicCardResponse 词典定义的结构，并且可能看起来像这样：

trans-unit.source: Once the position of the vertex is computed, and we pass the coordinates of the texel corresponding to the vertex to the fragment shader, we can work on computing the shading for the vertex.
trans-unit.target: 一旦计算出顶点的位置,我们将顶点对应的texel的坐标传给碎片着色器,我们就可以着手计算顶点的着色了。

trans-unit.source: Once the presentation starts, you'll be able to see the stereoscopic view displayed in the browser:
trans-unit.target: 演示开始后,你就能看到浏览器中显示的立体视图。

trans-unit.source: Once the script knows whether the property or properties it wishes to use are supported, it can then check the capabilities of the API and its implementation by examining the object returned by the track's getCapabilities() method; this object lists each supported constraint and the values or range of values which are supported.
trans-unit.target: 一旦脚本知道是否支持它希望使用的一个或多个属性，就可以通过检查轨道的 getCapabilities() 方法返回的对象来检查API 的功能及其实现。该对象列出了每个受支持的约束以及受支持的值或值范围。

trans-unit.source: Once the shader has the source code, it's compiled using gl.compileShader().
trans-unit.target: 着色器获得源代码后，将使用 gl.compileShader() 对其进行编译。

trans-unit.source: Once the shader program is built, we compute the aspect ratio of our context by dividing its width by its height. Then we set the current rotation vector for the animation to [0, 1], and the scaling vector to [1.0, aspectRatio]. The scaling vector, as we saw in the vertex shader, is used to scale the coordinates to fit the -1.0 to 1.0 range.
trans-unit.target: 生成着色器程序后，我们通过将上下文的宽度除以其高度来计算上下文的纵横比。然后，将动画的当前旋转向量设置为 [0, 1] ，并将缩放向量设置为 [1.0, aspectRatio] 。正如我们在顶点着色器中看到的那样，缩放向量用于缩放坐标以适合-1.0到1.0范围。

trans-unit.source: Once the shaders are established, the locations are looked up, and the square plane's vertex positions put in a buffer, we can actually render the scene. Since we're not animating anything in this example, our drawScene() function is very simple. It uses a few utility routines we'll cover shortly.
trans-unit.target: 一旦建立了着色器，便查找了位置，并将正方形平面的顶点位置放入了缓冲区中，我们便可以实际渲染场景了。由于在此示例中我们没有设置任何动画，因此 drawScene() 函数非常简单。它使用了一些实用程序例程，我们将在稍后介绍。

trans-unit.source: Once the source media is playing and you've reached the point where you're ready to record video, call MediaRecorder.start() to begin recording.
trans-unit.target: 播放源媒体后，您就可以开始录制视频了，请调用 MediaRecorder.start() 开始录制。

trans-unit.source: Once the speech recognition is started, there are many event handlers that can be used to retrieve results, and other pieces of surrounding information (see the SpeechRecognition event handlers list.) The most common one you'll probably use is SpeechRecognition.onresult, which is fired once a successful result is received:
trans-unit.target: 一旦开始语音识别，就会有许多事件处理程序可用于检索结果以及其他周围的信息（请参见 SpeechRecognition 事件处理程序列表。）您可能会使用的最常见的是 SpeechRecognition.onresult ，收到成功结果后会被触发：

trans-unit.source: Once the stream is linked to the <video> element, we start it playing by calling HTMLMediaElement.play().
trans-unit.target: 将流链接到 <video> 元素后，我们通过调用 HTMLMediaElement.play() 开始播放。

trans-unit.source: Once the string is assembled, containing the device's name in bold and the direction in parentheses, it's appended to the appropriate list by calling appendChild() on either audioList or videoList, as appropriate based on the device type.
trans-unit.target: 字符串组装完成后（包含以粗体显示的设备名称和括号中的方向 appendChild() ，可以根据设备类型，通过在 audioList 或 videoList 上调用appendChild（）将其附加到适当的列表中。

trans-unit.source: Once the track is selected, you can obtain from its RTCRtpSender the RTCDTMFSender object you'll use for sending DTMF. From there, you can simply call RTCDTMFSender.insertDTMF() to enqueue DTMF signals to be sent on the track to the other peer. The RTCRtpSender will then send the tones to the other peer as packets alongside the track's audio data.
trans-unit.target: 一旦选择了轨道，就可以从其 RTCRtpSender 获取 RTCDTMFSender 对象，该对象将用于发送DTMF。从那里，您可以简单地调用 RTCDTMFSender.insertDTMF() 使DTMF信号排队，以便在轨道上发送给其他对等方。然后， RTCRtpSender 将音调作为数据包与轨道的音频数据一起发送给另一个对等方。

trans-unit.source: Once the two peers agree upon a mutually-compatible candidate, that candidate's SDP is used by each peer to construct and open a connection, through which media then begins to flow. If they later agree on a better (usually higher-performance) candidate, the stream may change formats as needed.
trans-unit.target: 一旦两个对等体商定了一个相互兼容的候选者,每个对等体就会使用该候选者的SDP来构建和打开一个连接,然后媒体就开始通过该连接流动。如果他们后来同意一个更好的(通常是性能更高的)候选者,流可以根据需要改变格式。

trans-unit.source: Once the user clicks the "OK" button in the welcome panel, the JavaScript code swaps the two panels by changing their respective values for hidden. The follow-up panel looks like this in HTML:
trans-unit.target: 一旦用户单击欢迎面板中的“确定”按钮，JavaScript代码就会通过更改两个面板各自的 hidden 值来交换两个面板。后续面板在HTML中如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Once the vertex array has been created, we create a new GL buffer to contain them by calling gl.createBuffer(). We bind the standard WebGL array buffer reference to that by calling gl.bindBuffer() and then copy the vertex data into the buffer using gl.bufferData(). The usage hint gl.STATIC_DRAW is specified, telling WebGL that the data will be set only one time and never modified, but will be used repeatedly. This lets WebGL consider any optimizations it can apply that may improve performance based on that information.
trans-unit.target: 创建顶点数组后，我们将通过调用 gl.createBuffer() 创建一个新的GL缓冲区以包含它们。我们通过调用 gl.bindBuffer() 将标准WebGL数组缓冲区引用绑定到该缓冲区引用，然后使用 gl.bufferData() 将顶点数据复制到缓冲区中。指定了用法提示 gl.STATIC_DRAW ，它告诉WebGL数据将仅设置一次，并且从不修改，但将重复使用。这使WebGL可以基于该信息考虑可以应用的，可以提高性能的任何优化。

trans-unit.source: Once the vertex arrays are generated, we need to build the element array.
trans-unit.target: 顶点数组生成后,我们需要建立元素数组。

trans-unit.source: Once this code has completed, finally the video being sent by the other peer is displayed in the local browser window!
trans-unit.target: 当这段代码完成后,最后对方对等体发送的视频就会显示在本地浏览器窗口中!

trans-unit.source: Once this is done, you can, for example:
trans-unit.target: 一旦这样做,你可以,例如。

trans-unit.source: Once this method returns, the signaling state as returned by RTCPeerConnection.signalingState is closed.

trans-unit.source: Once transmission of the tones is complete, the connection is closed. You can click "Dial" again to reconnect and send the tones again.

trans-unit.source: Once you've established a WebRTC peer connection using the RTCPeerConnection interface, you're able to send and receive media data between the two peers on the connection. But there's a lot more you can do with WebRTC. In this guide, we'll examine how to add a data channel to a peer connection, which can then be used to securely exchange arbitrary data; that is, any kind of data we wish, in any format we choose.
trans-unit.target: 使用 RTCPeerConnection 接口建立WebRTC对等连接后，就可以在该连接上的两个对等之间发送和接收媒体数据。但是，使用WebRTC还可以做更多的事情。在本指南中，我们将研究如何向对等连接添加数据通道，然后可以使用该通道安全地交换任意数据。也就是说，我们希望以任何格式选择的任何类型的数据。

trans-unit.source: One of the most common cases for orientation changes is when you want to revise the layout of your content based on the orientation of the device. For example, perhaps you want a button bar to stretch along the longest dimension of the device's display. By using a media query, you can do this easily and automatically.
trans-unit.target: 方向变化最常见的情况之一是当你想根据设备的方向修改内容的布局。例如,也许你想让按钮栏沿着设备显示的最长尺寸延伸。通过使用媒体查询,您可以轻松自动地实现这一点。

trans-unit.source: One of the most difficult tasks is to maintain a constant and high framerate value, so we must optimize our code to make it as efficient as possible. It is preferable to have a decent framerate that doesn't constantly or suddenly change; for this you need to as few necessary objects moving into the scene as possible and (in the case of WebGL) try to reduce draw calls.
trans-unit.target: 最困难的任务之一是保持一个恒定的高帧率值,所以我们必须优化我们的代码,使其尽可能的高效。最好是有一个不错的帧率,而不是不断地或突然地改变;为此,你需要尽可能地减少移动到场景中的必要对象,并且(在WebGL的情况下)尽量减少绘制调用。

trans-unit.source: One of the most interesting features of the Web Audio API is the ability to extract frequency, waveform, and other data from your audio source, which can then be used to create visualizations. This article explains how, and provides a couple of basic use cases.

trans-unit.source: One or more of the values in the candidate string are invalid or could not be parsed.
trans-unit.target: candidate 字符串中的一个或多个值无效或无法解析。

trans-unit.source: One or more of the values in the values array is non-finite. Non-finite values are NaN, Infinity, and -Infinity.
trans-unit.target: values 数组中的一个或多个值是非有限的。非限定值为 NaN ， Infinity 和 -Infinity 。

trans-unit.source: One overriding problem that web users have suffered with for years is loss of connectivity. The best web app in the world will provide a terrible user experience if you can’t download it. There have been various attempts to create technologies to solve this problem, as our Offline page shows, and some of the issues have been solved. But the overriding problem is that there still isn’t a good overall control mechanism for asset caching and custom network requests.
trans-unit.target: 网络用户多年来遭受的一个首要问题是失去连接。如果您无法下载，世界上最好的Web应用程序将提供可怕的用户体验。正如我们的离线页面所示，已经进行了各种尝试来创建技术来解决该问题，并且已经解决了一些问题。但是最重​​要的问题是，对于资产缓存和自定义网络请求，仍然没有一个好的总体控制机制。

trans-unit.source: One scenario in which this is helpful is to support adapting the media source to changing bandwidth availability, by transitioning from one codec to another as resource constraints change.
trans-unit.target: 这一点很有帮助的一种情况是,随着资源限制的变化,通过从一个编解码器过渡到另一个编解码器,支持媒体源适应带宽可用性的变化。

trans-unit.source: One technique for preventing things like pinchZoom on a page is to call preventDefault() on the second touch in a series. This behavior is not well defined in the touch events spec, and results in different behavior for different browsers (i.e., iOS will prevent zooming but still allow panning with both fingers; Android will allow zooming but not panning; Opera and Firefox currently prevent all panning and zooming.) Currently, it's not recommended to depend on any particular behavior in this case, but rather to depend on meta viewport to prevent zooming.
trans-unit.target: 一种防止在页面上出现诸如 pinchZoom 之类的技术的方法是在系列的第二次触摸中调用 preventDefault() 。此行为在触摸事件规范中没有很好定义，并且导致不同浏览器具有不同的行为（即，iOS将阻止缩放但仍然允许用两只手平移； Android将允许缩放但不能平移； Opera和Firefox当前阻止所有平移和缩放。）目前，不建议在这种情况下依赖于任何特定行为，而应依赖元视口以防止缩放。

trans-unit.source: One thing that may not be clear in this example is the use of the pendingUpdate flag and the call to requestAnimationFrame(). The pendingUpdate flag serves to prevent multiple invocations of the transfrom that can occur when onresize and onscroll fire at the same time. Using requestAnimationFrame() ensures that the transform ocurrs before the next render.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中可能不清楚的一件事是使用 pendingUpdate 标志和对 requestAnimationFrame() 的调用。该 pendingUpdate 标志用来防止可能发生的当transfrom的多次调用 onresize 和 onscroll 在同一时间起火。使用 requestAnimationFrame() 可确保在下一次渲染之前发生转换。

trans-unit.source: One thing the Intersection Observer API can't tell you: the exact number of pixels that overlap or specifically which ones they are; however, it covers the much more common use case of "If they intersect by somewhere around N%, I need to do something."
trans-unit.target: Intersection Observer API不能告诉您的一件事：重叠的像素的确切数量或确切地说是它们的像素；但是，它涵盖了更常见的用例：“如果它们相交于N％左右的某个位置，则我需要做些事情。”

trans-unit.source: One thing we want to be able to do is update our document with log output and progress information. However, you can't safely change the DOM from within an idle callback. Instead, we'll use requestAnimationFrame() to ask the browser to call us when it's safe to update the display.
trans-unit.target: 我们希望能够做的一件事是使用日志输出和进度信息来更新我们的文档。但是，您不能从空闲回调中安全地更改DOM。取而代之的是，我们将使用 requestAnimationFrame() 要求浏览器在安全更新显示内容时调用我们。

trans-unit.source: One useful technique to employ is customizing the payment request button depending on whether users can make payments.
trans-unit.target: 一个有用的技术是根据用户是否可以支付来定制支付请求按钮。

trans-unit.source: One very experimental feature of streams is the ability to pipe streams into one another (called a pipe chain). This involves two methods — ReadableStream.pipeThrough(), which pipes a readable stream through a writer/reader pair to transform one data format into another, and ReadableStream.pipeTo(), which pipes a readable stream to a writer acting as an end point for the pipe chain.
trans-unit.target: 流的一个非常实验性的特征是能够将流彼此管道连接（称为管道链）。这涉及两种方法： ReadableStream.pipeThrough() 通过读取器/读取器对通过管道传递可读流，以将一种数据格式转换为另一种数据格式； ReadableStream.pipeTo() 将通过读取器的可读流通过管道传递给作为终点的写入器。用于管链。

trans-unit.source: One very useful function, which doesn't actually draw anything but becomes part of the path list described above, is the moveTo() function. You can probably best think of this as lifting a pen or pencil from one spot on a piece of paper and placing it on the next.
trans-unit.target: moveTo() 函数是一个非常有用的函数，它实际上不会绘制任何内容，但会成为上述路径列表的一部分。您可能最能想到的是将笔或铅笔从一张纸上的一个地方提起，然后放在另一张纸上。

trans-unit.source: One way to think about arcTo() is to imagine two straight segments: one from the starting point to a first control point, and another from there to a second control point. Without arcTo(), these two segments would form a sharp corner: arcTo() creates a circular arc that fits this corner and smooths is out. In other words, the arc is tangential to both segments.
trans-unit.target: 考虑 arcTo() 的一种方法是想象两个直线段：一个从起点到第一个控制点，另一个从那里到第二个控制点。如果没有 arcTo() ，则这两个段将形成一个尖角： arcTo() 创建一个适合此角的圆弧并平滑。换句话说，弧线与两个线段相切。

trans-unit.source: One way to use the OffscreenCanvas API, is to use a RenderingContext that has been obtained from an OffscreenCanvas object to generate new frames. Once a new frame has finished rendering in this context, the transferToImageBitmap() method can be called to save the most recent rendered image. This method returns an ImageBitmap object, which can be used in a variety of Web APIs and also in a second canvas without creating a transfer copy.
trans-unit.target: 使用 OffscreenCanvas API的一种方法是使用从 OffscreenCanvas 对象获得的 RenderingContext 生成新帧。一旦在此上下文中完成新帧的渲染，就可以调用 transferToImageBitmap() 方法以保存最新的渲染图像。此方法返回一个 ImageBitmap 对象，该对象可以在各种Web API和第二个画布中使用，而无需创建传输副本。

trans-unit.source: Only one click handler can be assigned to an object at a time with this property. You may be inclined to use the EventTarget.addEventListener() method instead, since it is more flexible and part of the DOM Events specification.
trans-unit.target: 使用此属性，一次只能将一个 click 处理程序分配给一个对象。您可能倾向于改用 EventTarget.addEventListener() 方法，因为它更灵活并且是DOM Events规范的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Only one form-associated element in a document can have this attribute specified. If there are several, the first element with the attribute set inserted, usually the first such element on the page, get the initial focus.
trans-unit.target: 在一个文档中,只能指定一个与表单相关的元素的属性。如果有多个元素,则插入该属性的第一个元素,通常是页面上第一个这样的元素,获得初始焦点。

trans-unit.source: Only one payment request can be in the process of being handled at once, across all documents. Once one PaymentRequest's show() method has been called, any other call to show() will by rejected with an AbortError until the returned promise has been concluded, either by being fulfilled with a PaymentResponse indicating the results of the payment request, or by being rejected with an error.
trans-unit.target: 所有文件中一次只能处理一个付款请求。一旦 PaymentRequest 的 show() 方法，将通过 AbortError 拒绝对 show() 的任何其他调用，直到返回的诺言结束为止，或者通过显示付款请求结果的 PaymentResponse 来实现，或者被错误拒绝。

trans-unit.source: Only one reader can read a stream at a time; when a reader is created and starts reading a stream (an active reader), we say it is locked to it. If you want another reader to start reading your stream, you typically need to cancel the first reader before you do anything else (although you can tee streams, see the Teeing section below)
trans-unit.target: 一次只能读取一个流。当创建阅读器并开始阅读流（活动的Reader）时，我们说它已被锁定。如果想要另一个读者开始阅读流，通常需要你做任何事情之前，取消第一个读者（虽然可以发球流，请参见下面的发球节）

trans-unit.source: Only used for senders whose track's kind is "video", this is a double-precision floating-point value specifying a scaling factor to apply while encoding the video. The default value, 1.0, means that the sent video's size will be the same as the original. A value of 2.0 scales the video frames down by a factor of 2 in each dimension, resulting in a video 1/4 the size of the original. The value must not be less than 1.0.
trans-unit.target: 仅用于跟踪 kind 为 "video" ，这是一个双精度浮点值，指定在对视频进行编码时要应用的缩放比例。默认值为1.0，表示发送的视频大小将与原始大小相同。值2.0会将视频帧在每个维度上缩小2倍，从而使视频的大小是原始大小的1/4。该值不能小于1.0。

trans-unit.source: Opening new windows, even with reduced features, uses considerably a lot of the user's system resources (cpu, RAM) and involves considerably a lot of coding in the source code (security management, memory management, various code branchings sometimes quite complex, window frame/chrome/toolbars building, window positioning and sizing, etc.). Opening new tabs is less demanding on the user's system resources (and faster to achieve) than opening new windows.
trans-unit.target: 打开新的窗口,即使减少了功能,也会耗费大量的用户系统资源(cpu,RAM),并且在源代码中涉及大量的编码(安全管理,内存管理,各种代码分支,有时相当复杂,窗口框架/chrome/工具栏的建立,窗口的定位和大小,等等)。打开新的标签页比打开新的窗口对用户的系统资源要求更低(实现速度更快)。

trans-unit.source: Opens a document stream for writing.
trans-unit.target: 打开文档流进行写作。

trans-unit.source: Opens a new browser window for a given url and returns a Promise for the new WindowClient.
trans-unit.target: 为给定的URL打开一个新的浏览器窗口，并为新的 WindowClient 返回一个 Promise 。

trans-unit.source: Opens a new dialog window.
trans-unit.target: 打开一个新的对话窗口。

trans-unit.source: Opens a new window.
trans-unit.target: 打开一个新窗口。

trans-unit.source: Opens an index from this object store after which it can, for example, be used to return a sequence of records sorted by that index using a cursor.
trans-unit.target: 打开这个对象存储中的索引,之后,例如,可以使用游标返回由该索引排序的记录序列。

trans-unit.source: Opens and returns a connection to a database. Blocks the calling thread until the connection object is ready to return. If there is already a database with the specified name, it uses that one; otherwise, it creates the database using the specified name and description.
trans-unit.target: 打开并返回与数据库的连接。阻塞调用线程，直到连接对象准备好返回为止。如果已经有一个具有指定名称的数据库，它将使用该名称；否则，将使用该名称。否则，它将使用指定的名称和描述创建数据库。

trans-unit.source: Opens the Print Dialog to print the current document.
trans-unit.target: 打开 "打印 "对话框,打印当前文档。

trans-unit.source: Opens the index with the given name, using the mode of the current transaction.
trans-unit.target: 使用当前事务的模式,打开给定名称的索引。

trans-unit.source: Opens the object store with the given name in the connected database using the specified mode.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的模式在连接的数据库中打开指定名称的对象存储。

trans-unit.source: Opens the specified URL in a new window, if and only if the given URL is on the same origin as the calling page. It returns a Promise that resolves with a reference to a WindowClient.
trans-unit.target: 当且仅当给定URL与调用页面位于同一来源时，才在新窗口中打开指定的URL。它返回一个 Promise ，该Promise通过引用 WindowClient 来解决。

trans-unit.source: Operations performed using IndexedDB are done asynchronously, so as not to block applications. IndexedDB originally included both synchronous and asynchronous APIs. The synchronous API was intended for use only with Web Workers but was removed from the spec because it was unclear whether it was needed. However, the synchronous API may be reintroduced if there is enough demand from web developers.
trans-unit.target: 使用IndexedDB执行的操作是异步完成的，以免阻塞应用程序。IndexedDB最初包含同步和异步API。同步API仅适用于Web Workers，但由于尚不清楚是否需要它而已从规范中删除。但是，如果Web开发人员有足够的需求，则可以重新引入同步API。

trans-unit.source: Opposite to MSIE, which almost all kinds of elements receive focus event, almost all kinds of elements on Gecko browsers do NOT work with this event.
trans-unit.target: 与几乎所有元素都能接收焦点事件的MSIE相反,Gecko浏览器上几乎所有元素都不能使用该事件。

trans-unit.source: Optional but defaults to true.
trans-unit.target: 可选，但默认为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Optional cue settings with at least one space before the first and between each setting
trans-unit.target: 可选的提示设置,在第一个设置前和每个设置之间至少有一个空格。

trans-unit.source: Optional. A string representing the encoding to be used, like iso-8859-1 or UTF-8.
trans-unit.target: 可选的。表示要使用的编码的字符串，例如iso-8859-1或UTF-8。

trans-unit.source: Optional. The version to open the database with. If the version is not provided and the database exists, then a connection to the database will be opened without changing its version. If the version is not provided and the database does not exist, then it will be created with version 1.
trans-unit.target: 可选的。用于打开数据库的版本。如果未提供版本并且数据库存在，则将打开与数据库的连接而不更改其版本。如果未提供版本且数据库不存在，则将使用版本 1 创建数据库。

trans-unit.source: Optionally, in newer browser versions, you can specify the direction in which selection should be considered to have occurred; this lets you indicate, for example, that the selection as set by the user clicking and dragging from the end of the selected text toward the beginning.
trans-unit.target: 在较新的浏览器版本中,您可以指定选择发生的方向;这让您可以表明,例如,用户从所选文本的末尾向开头点击和拖动所设置的选择。

trans-unit.source: Optionally, see RFC 5245: Interactive Connectivity Establishment, section 2.6 ("Concluding ICE") if you want greater understanding of this process is completed inside the ICE layer. You should note that candidates are exchanged and media starts to flow as soon as the ICE layer is satisfied. This all taken care of behind the scenes. Our role is to simply send the candidates, back and forth, through the signaling server.
trans-unit.target: （可选）如果要在ICE层内部完成此过程的详细了解，请参阅RFC 5245：交互式连接建立，第2.6节（“包含ICE”）。您应注意，一旦满足ICE层，就交换候选人，并且媒体开始流动。所有这些都在幕后进行。我们的作用是简单地通过信令服务器来回发送候选人。

trans-unit.source: Orientation — The rotation of the HMD around three axes in a 3D coordinate space. Pitch is rotation around the x axis, yaw is rotation around the y axis, and roll is rotation around the z axis. In WebVR, the pitch, yaw, and roll are represented by the first three elements of the array contained in VRPose.orientation.
trans-unit.target: 方向— HMD在3D坐标空间中围绕三个轴的旋转。俯仰是绕x轴旋转，偏航是绕y轴旋转，侧倾是绕z轴旋转。在WebVR中，俯仰，偏航和横滚由 VRPose.orientation 中包含的数组的前三个元素表示。

trans-unit.source: Origin 1 has some Web Storage data as well as some IndexedDB data, but also has some free space left; its current usage hasn't yet reached its quota.
trans-unit.target: Origin 1有一些Web存储数据以及一些IndexedDB数据,但也还有一些空闲空间,它目前的使用量还没有达到配额。

trans-unit.source: Origin 2 has no data stored in it yet; it's just an empty box waiting for content. This origin, however, has a lower quota than the other two do. It may be a less-visited site, or one known to have lower data storage requirements.
trans-unit.target: 起源2还没有数据存储在里面,它只是一个等待内容的空盒子。然而,这个原点比其他两个原点的配额要低。它可能是一个访问量较少的网站,或者是一个已知的数据存储要求较低的网站。

trans-unit.source: Origin 3's storage unit is completely full; it's reached its quota and can't store any more data without some existing material being removed.
trans-unit.target: Origin 3的存储单元已经完全满了,它已经达到了配额,如果不删除一些现有的材料,就无法再存储任何数据。

trans-unit.source: Originally, Microsoft intended this method to return a TextRectangle object for each line of text. However, the CSSOM working draft specifies that it returns a DOMRect for each border box. For an inline element, the two definitions are the same. But for a block element, Mozilla will return only a single rectangle.
trans-unit.target: 最初，Microsoft打算使用此方法为每一行文本返回一个TextRectangle对象。但是，CSSOM工作草案指定它为每个边界框返回一个 DOMRect 。对于内联元素，这两个定义是相同的。但是对于块元素，Mozilla将仅返回一个矩形。

trans-unit.source: Originally, it detached the NodeIterator from the set over which it iterates, releasing any resources used by the set and setting the iterator's state to INVALID. Once this method had been called, calls to other methods on NodeIterator would raise the INVALID_STATE_ERR exception.
trans-unit.target: 最初，它将 NodeIterator 从其进行迭代的集合中分离出来，释放该集合使用的所有资源，并将迭代器的状态设置为 INVALID 。调用此方法后，在 NodeIterator 上调用其他方法将引发 INVALID_STATE_ERR 异常。

trans-unit.source: Originally, this property was defined as a long integer. The CSSOM View Module redefined it as a double float. See the Browser compatibility section for details.
trans-unit.target: 最初，此属性被定义为 long 整数。所述CSSOM视图模块重新定义它作为一个 double 浮动。有关详细信息，请参见浏览器兼容性部分。

trans-unit.source: Origins that have never been interacted with as a first party do not have a notion of first-party storage. From the user’s perspective, they only have a third-party relationship with that origin. Access requests are automatically denied if the browser detects that the user hasn’t interacted with the embedded content in a first-party context recently (in Firefox, "recently" is "within 30 days").
trans-unit.target: 从未作为第一方与之交互的源没有第一方存储的概念。从用户的角度来看，他们与该来源仅具有第三方关系。如果浏览器检测到用户最近未在第一方上下文中与嵌入内容进行交互（在Firefox中，“最近”是“在30天内”），则访问请求将自动被拒绝。

trans-unit.source: Our observer's callback keeps an eye out for ads which become 100% obscured and have a total visible time of at least one minute. When that happens, the replaceAd() function is called with that ad's element as an input, so that the old ad can be replaced with a new one.

trans-unit.source: Our chat server uses the WebSocket API to send information as JSON strings between each client and the server. The server supports several message types to handle tasks, such as registering new users, setting usernames, and sending public chat messages.
trans-unit.target: 我们的聊天服务器使用WebSocket API在每个客户端和服务器之间以JSON字符串的形式发送信息。该服务器支持多种消息类型以处理任务，例如注册新用户，设置用户名和发送公共聊天消息。

It features, among other things, a "Reset Sensor" button in the UI, which when pressed runs the resetSensor() function on the position sensor. The JavaScript looks like this:

Our positionsensorvrdevice demo uses the WebVR API to update the view of a simple 2D canvas scene on each frame of a requestAnimationFrame loop. The main function that updates the view data is as follows:
Our feedback values cannot start with zero, otherwise on the first pass nothing would be sent back:
trans-unit.target: 我们的 feedback 值不能以零开头，否则在第一遍将什么也不会发回：

trans-unit.source: Our requestAnimationFrame() callback receives as input a single parameter, currentTime, which specifies the time at which the frame drawing began. We use that and the saved time at which the last frame was drawn, previousTime, along with the number of degrees per second the square should rotate (degreesPerSecond) to calculate the new value of currentAngle. Then the value of previousTime is updated and we call animateScene() to draw the next frame (and in turn schedule the next frame to be drawn, ad infinitum).
trans-unit.target: 我们的 requestAnimationFrame() 回调将单个参数 currentTime 作为输入接收，该参数指定框架绘制开始的时间。我们使用，并在其最后一帧绘制，保存的时间 previousTime ，以每秒平方度的数量应该一起旋转（ degreesPerSecond ）来计算的新值 currentAngle 中。然后，更新 previousTime 的值，并调用 animateScene() 绘制下一帧（并依次调度要绘制的下一帧）。

trans-unit.source: Our boombox looks like this:
trans-unit.target: 我们的录音机是这样的

trans-unit.source: Our call to insertDTMF() specifies not only the DTMF to send (dialString), but also the length of each tone in milliseconds (400 ms) and the amount of time between tones (50 ms).
trans-unit.target: 我们对 insertDTMF() 的调用不仅指定了要发送的DTMF（ dialString ），而且还指定了每个音调的长度（以毫秒为单位）（400毫秒）以及音调之间的时间间隔（50毫秒）。

trans-unit.source: Our demo also features:
trans-unit.target: 我们的演示还具有:

trans-unit.source: Our demo features the holy grail of WebGL demos — a rotating 3D cube. We've implemented this using raw WebGL API code. We won't be teaching any basic JavaScript or WebGL, just the WebVR parts.
trans-unit.target: 我们的演示以WebGL演示的圣杯为特色-旋转的3D立方体。我们已经使用原始WebGL API代码实现了这一点。我们不会讲任何基本的JavaScript或WebGL，而只会讲WebVR的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Our design requires that when the connection is established, we immediately send the DTMF string. To accomplish that, we watch for the caller to receive an iceconnectionstatechange event. This event is sent when one of a number of changes occurs to the state of the ICE connection process, including the successful establishment of a connection.
trans-unit.target: 我们的设计要求在建立连接后立即发送DTMF字符串。为此，我们监视调用方是否接收到 iceconnectionstatechange 事件。当ICE连接过程的状态发生多种更改之一（包括成功建立连接）时，将发送此事件。

trans-unit.source: Our example's remote peer, on the other hand, ignores the status change events, except for logging the event to the console:
trans-unit.target: 而我们的例子中的远程对等体,除了将事件记录到控制台外,会忽略状态变化事件。

trans-unit.source: Our idle callback handler, runTaskQueue(), gets called when the browser determines there's enough idle time available to let us do some work or our timeout of one second expires. This function's job is to run our enqueued tasks.
trans-unit.target: 我们的空闲回调处理程序runTaskQueue(),会在浏览器确定有足够的空闲时间让我们做一些工作,或者一秒钟的超时时间到期时被调用。这个函数的工作是运行我们的enqueued任务。

trans-unit.source: Our interval handler, handleRefreshInterval(), is called about once per second courtesy of the call to setInterval() made in the startup() function described above. Its main job is to update the timers every second and schedule a redraw to update the timers we'll be drawing within each ad.
trans-unit.target: 我们的间隔处理程序， handleRefreshInterval() ，被称为约一次每调用的第二礼貌 setInterval() 在由 startup() 函数如上所述。它的主要工作是每秒更新计时器，并安排重绘以更新我们将在每个广告中绘制的计时器。

trans-unit.source: Our original chat demo didn't support sending messages to a specific user. The next task is to update the main WebSocket message handler to support doing so. This involves a change near the end of the "connection" message handler:
trans-unit.target: 我们最初的聊天演示不支持向特定用户发送消息。下一个任务是更新主WebSocket消息处理程序以支持这样做。这涉及到 "connection" 消息处理程序即将结束时的更改：

trans-unit.source: Our rotation values are a little more involved, however, as we need to move the sound around. Not only do we have to update two axis values (e.g. if you rotate an object around the x-axis, you update the y and z coordinates for that object), but we also need to do some more maths for this. The rotation is a circle and we need Math.sin and Math.cos to help us draw that circle.
trans-unit.target: 我们的旋转值是一个涉及多一点，但是，当我们需要移动的声音四处。我们不仅必须更新两个轴的值（例如，如果绕x轴旋转对象，还需要更新该对象的y和z坐标），而且我们还需要为此做更多的数学运算。旋转是一个圆，我们需要 Math.sin 和 Math.cos 来帮助我们绘制该圆。

trans-unit.source: Our sidebar is used to present links to other pages on the site. None of them work in our example here, but they exist to help with the presentation of a blog-like experience. The sidebar is represented using an <aside> element, and is styled as follows:
trans-unit.target: 我们的侧边栏用于显示指向网站上其他页面的链接。在我们的示例中，它们都不起作用，但是它们的存在是为了帮助呈现类似博客的体验。边栏使用 <aside> 元素表示，其样式如下：

trans-unit.source: Our simple example for this guide provides a play/pause button that starts and pauses audio play, and a toggle that turns an IIR filter on and off, altering the tone of the sound. It also provides a canvas on which is drawn the frequency response of the audio, so you can see what effect the IIR filter has.
trans-unit.target: 本指南的简单示例提供了一个开始和暂停音频播放的播放/暂停按钮,以及一个打开和关闭IIR滤波器、改变声音音调的切换按钮。它还提供了一个画布,在画布上绘制了音频的频率响应,这样你就可以看到IIR滤波器的效果。

trans-unit.source: Our vertex shader below receives vertex position values from an attribute we define called aVertexPosition. That position is then multiplied by two 4x4 matrices we provide called uProjectionMatrix and uModelViewMatrix; gl_Position is set to the result. For more info on projection and other matrixes you might find this article useful.
trans-unit.target: 下面的顶点着色器从定义为 aVertexPosition 的属性接收顶点位置值。然后 uProjectionMatrix 位置乘以我们提供的两个4x4矩阵uProjectionMatrix和 uModelViewMatrix ； gl_Position 设置为结果。有关投影和其他矩阵的更多信息，您可能会发现本文很有用。

trans-unit.source: Outputs of these nodes could be linked to inputs of others, which mix or modify these streams of sound samples into different streams. A common modification is multiplying the samples by a value to make them louder or quieter (as is the case with GainNode). Once the sound has been sufficiently processed for the intended effect, it can be linked to the input of a destination (AudioContext.destination), which sends the sound to the speakers or headphones. This last connection is only necessary if the user is supposed to hear the audio.
trans-unit.target: 这些节点的输出可以链接到其他节点的输入，后者将这些声音样本流混合或修改为不同的流。常见的修改是将样本乘以一个值，以使它们更大声或更安静（与 GainNode 一样）。一旦对声音进行了充分的处理以达到预期的效果，就可以将其链接到目标的输入（ AudioContext.destination ），该目标会将声音发送到扬声器或耳机。仅当用户应该听到音频时才需要最后一个连接。

trans-unit.source: Over a decade ago, Synchronized Multimedia Integration Language, or SMIL (pronounced "smile"), brought animation to SVG. Back then it was the only animation engine browsers had to worry about. While four out of five browsers supported SMIL, it only animated SVG elements, could not be used from CSS, and was very complex — often leading to inconsistent implementations. Ten years later, the Safari team introduced the CSS Animations and CSS Transitions specs.
trans-unit.target: 十多年前，同步多媒体集成语言（SMIL，发音为“微笑”）将动画带入了SVG。当时，这是浏览器唯一需要担心的动画引擎。尽管五分之四的浏览器都支持SMIL，但它只能对SVG元素进行动画处理，无法在CSS中使用，并且非常复杂-经常导致实现不一致。十年后，Safari团队推出了CSS动画和CSS过渡规范。

trans-unit.source: Packets are sequence-numbered and time-stamped for reassembly if they arrive out of order. This lets data sent using RTP be delivered on transports that don't guarantee ordering or even guarantee delivery at all.
trans-unit.target: 数据包被序列编号,并有时间戳,以便在数据包到达时不按顺序重新组装。这使得使用RTP发送的数据可以在不保证排序甚至根本不保证发送的传输上进行传输。

trans-unit.source: Part of the WebGL API, the WebGLRenderingContext method getUniformLocation() returns the location of a specific uniform variable which is part of a given WebGLProgram. The uniform variable is returned as a WebGLUniformLocation object, which is an opaque identifier used to specify where in the GPU's memory that uniform variable is located.
trans-unit.target: 作为WebGL API的一部分， WebGLRenderingContext 方法 getUniformLocation() 返回特定统一变量的位置，该统一变量是给定 WebGLProgram 的一部分。统一变量作为 WebGLUniformLocation 对象返回，这是一个不透明的标识符，用于指定统一变量在GPU内存中的位置。

trans-unit.source: Part of the Media Capture and Streams API.
trans-unit.target: 在部分媒体捕获和流API。

trans-unit.source: Part of the PublicKeyCredential, the AuthenticatorResponse includes information from the browser (such as the challenge and origin); as well as information from the authenticator such as an AuthenticatorAttestationResponse (for new credentials) or an AuthenticatorAssertionResponse (when authenticating with existing credentials).
trans-unit.target: 作为PublicKeyCredential的一部分,AuthenticatorResponse包括来自浏览器的信息(如挑战和来源);以及来自验证器的信息,如AuthenticatorAttestationResponse(对于新凭证)或AuthenticatorAssertionResponse(使用现有凭证进行验证时)。

trans-unit.source: Passcode entry
trans-unit.target: 密码输入

trans-unit.source: Passed to bindBuffer or bufferData to specify the type of buffer being used.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 bindBuffer 或 bufferData 以指定要使用的缓冲区的类型。

trans-unit.source: Passed to blendEquation or blendEquationSeparate to set an addition blend function.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 blendEquation 或 blendEquationSeparate 来设置附加混合功能。

trans-unit.source: Passed to blendEquation or blendEquationSeparate to specify a reverse subtraction blend function (destination - source).
trans-unit.target: 传递给 blendEquation 或 blendEquationSeparate 来指定反向减法混合函数（目标-源）。

trans-unit.source: Passed to blendEquation or blendEquationSeparate to specify a subtraction blend function (source - destination).
trans-unit.target: 传递给 blendEquation 或 blendEquationSeparate 以指定减法混合函数（源-目标）。

trans-unit.source: Passed to blendFunc or blendFuncSeparate to multiply a component by one minus the destination's alpha.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 blendFunc 或 blendFuncSeparate ,以将一个分量乘以一个目标的alpha值。

trans-unit.source: Passed to blendFunc or blendFuncSeparate to multiply a component by one minus the destination's color.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 blendFunc 或 blendFuncSeparate ,以将组件乘以一减去目标颜色。

trans-unit.source: Passed to blendFunc or blendFuncSeparate to multiply a component by one minus the source elements color.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 blendFunc 或 blendFuncSeparate ,以将组件乘以一减去源元素的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Passed to blendFunc or blendFuncSeparate to multiply a component by one minus the source's alpha.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 blendFunc 或 blendFuncSeparate ,以将一个分量乘以一个源的Alpha。

trans-unit.source: Passed to blendFunc or blendFuncSeparate to multiply a component by the destination's alpha.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 blendFunc 或 blendFuncSeparate ,以将组件乘以目标的alpha。

trans-unit.source: Passed to blendFunc or blendFuncSeparate to multiply a component by the destination's color.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 blendFunc 或 blendFuncSeparate ,以使组件乘以目标的颜色。

trans-unit.source: Passed to blendFunc or blendFuncSeparate to multiply a component by the minimum of source's alpha or one minus the destination's alpha.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 blendFunc 或 blendFuncSeparate ,以将组件乘以源Alpha的最小值或一个减去目标Alpha的最小值。

trans-unit.source: Passed to blendFunc or blendFuncSeparate to multiply a component by the source elements color.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 blendFunc 或 blendFuncSeparate ,以将组件乘以源元素颜色。

trans-unit.source: Passed to blendFunc or blendFuncSeparate to multiply a component by the source's alpha.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 blendFunc 或 blendFuncSeparate ,以将组件乘以源的Alpha。

trans-unit.source: Passed to blendFunc or blendFuncSeparate to specify a constant alpha blend function.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 blendFunc 或 blendFuncSeparate 以指定恒定的alpha混合函数。

trans-unit.source: Passed to blendFunc or blendFuncSeparate to specify a constant color blend function.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 blendFunc 或 blendFuncSeparate 以指定恒定的颜色混合函数。

trans-unit.source: Passed to blendFunc or blendFuncSeparate to specify one minus a constant alpha blend function.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 blendFunc 或 blendFuncSeparate 以指定一个减去恒定的alpha混合函数。

trans-unit.source: Passed to blendFunc or blendFuncSeparate to specify one minus a constant color blend function.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 blendFunc 或 blendFuncSeparate 指定一个减去恒定颜色混合函数的值。

trans-unit.source: Passed to blendFunc or blendFuncSeparate to turn off a component.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 blendFunc 或 blendFuncSeparate 以关闭组件。

trans-unit.source: Passed to blendFunc or blendFuncSeparate to turn on a component.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 blendFunc 或 blendFuncSeparate 以打开组件。

trans-unit.source: Passed to bufferData as a hint about whether the contents of the buffer are likely to be used often and change often.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 bufferData 作为有关缓冲区内容是否可能经常使用和经常更改的提示。

trans-unit.source: Passed to bufferData as a hint about whether the contents of the buffer are likely to be used often and not change often.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 bufferData 作为有关缓冲区内容是否可能经常使用且不经常更改的提示。

trans-unit.source: Passed to bufferData as a hint about whether the contents of the buffer are likely to not be used often.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 bufferData 作为有关是否可能不经常使用缓冲区内容的提示。

trans-unit.source: Passed to clear to clear the current color buffer.
trans-unit.target: 通过 clear 以清除当前颜色缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Passed to clear to clear the current depth buffer.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 clear 以清除当前深度缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Passed to clear to clear the current stencil buffer.
trans-unit.target: 通过 clear 以清除当前模板缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Passed to createShader to define a fragment shader.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 createShader 来定义片段着色器。

trans-unit.source: Passed to createShader to define a vertex shader
trans-unit.target: 传递给 createShader 来定义顶点着色器

trans-unit.source: Passed to cullFace to specify that front and back faces should be culled.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 cullFace 以指定应该剔除正面和背面。

trans-unit.source: Passed to cullFace to specify that only back faces should be culled.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 cullFace 以指定仅背面应该被剔除。

trans-unit.source: Passed to cullFace to specify that only front faces should be culled.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 cullFace 以指定仅正面被剔除。

trans-unit.source: Passed to depthFunction or stencilFunction to specify depth or stencil tests will always pass. i.e. Pixels will be drawn in the order they are drawn.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 depthFunction 或 stencilFunction 来指定深度或模板测试将始终通过。即像素将按照绘制顺序绘制。

trans-unit.source: Passed to depthFunction or stencilFunction to specify depth or stencil tests will never pass. i.e. Nothing will be drawn.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 depthFunction 或 stencilFunction 来指定深度或模板测试的将永远不会通过。即不会画任何东西。

trans-unit.source: Passed to depthFunction or stencilFunction to specify depth or stencil tests will pass if the new depth value is equals to the stored value.
trans-unit.target: 如果新的深度值等于存储的值，则传递给 depthFunction 或 stencilFunction 来指定深度或模板测试的测试将通过。

trans-unit.source: Passed to depthFunction or stencilFunction to specify depth or stencil tests will pass if the new depth value is greater than or equal to the stored value.
trans-unit.target: 如果新的深度值大于或等于存储的值，则传递给 depthFunction 或 stencilFunction 以指定深度或模板测试的测试将通过。

trans-unit.source: Passed to depthFunction or stencilFunction to specify depth or stencil tests will pass if the new depth value is greater than the stored value.
trans-unit.target: 如果新的深度值大于存储的值，则传递给 depthFunction 或 stencilFunction 指定深度或模板测试的测试将通过。

trans-unit.source: Passed to depthFunction or stencilFunction to specify depth or stencil tests will pass if the new depth value is less than or equal to the stored value.
trans-unit.target: 如果新的深度值小于或等于存储的值，则传递给 depthFunction 或 stencilFunction 以指定深度或模板测试的测试将通过。

trans-unit.source: Passed to depthFunction or stencilFunction to specify depth or stencil tests will pass if the new depth value is less than the stored value.
trans-unit.target: 如果新的深度值小于存储的值，则传递给 depthFunction 或 stencilFunction 指定深度或模板测试的测试将通过。

trans-unit.source: Passed to depthFunction or stencilFunction to specify depth or stencil tests will pass if the new depth value is not equal to the stored value.
trans-unit.target: 如果新的深度值不等于存储的值，则传递给 depthFunction 或 stencilFunction 以指定深度或模板测试的测试将通过。

trans-unit.source: Passed to drawElements or drawArrays to draw a connected group of line segments from the first vertex to the last.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 drawElements 或 drawArrays 以绘制从第一个顶点到最后一个顶点的一组相连的线段。

trans-unit.source: Passed to drawElements or drawArrays to draw a connected group of triangles.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 drawElements 或 drawArrays 以绘制一组相连的三角形。

trans-unit.source: Passed to drawElements or drawArrays to draw a connected group of triangles. Each vertex connects to the previous and the first vertex in the fan.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 drawElements 或 drawArrays 以绘制一组相连的三角形。每个顶点都连接到风扇中的上一个顶点和第一个顶点。

trans-unit.source: Passed to drawElements or drawArrays to draw lines. Each set of two vertices is treated as a separate line segment.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 drawElements 或 drawArrays 来绘制线条。每组两个顶点被视为一个单独的线段。

trans-unit.source: Passed to drawElements or drawArrays to draw lines. Each vertex connects to the one after it.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 drawElements 或 drawArrays 来绘制线条。每个顶点都连接到它后面的那个顶点。

trans-unit.source: Passed to drawElements or drawArrays to draw single points.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 drawElements 或 drawArrays 以绘制单点。

trans-unit.source: Passed to drawElements or drawArrays to draw triangles. Each set of three vertices creates a separate triangle.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 drawElements 或 drawArrays 以绘制三角形。每组三个顶点创建一个单独的三角形。

trans-unit.source: Passed to enable/disable to turn on/off blending. Can also be used with getParameter to find the current blending method.
trans-unit.target: 通过 enable / disable 以启用 / 禁用混合。也可以与 getParameter 一起使用以查找当前的混合方法。

trans-unit.source: Passed to enable/disable to turn on/off culling. Can also be used with getParameter to find the current culling method.
trans-unit.target: 通过 enable / disable 以打开/关闭剔除。也可以与 getParameter 一起使用以查找当前的剔除方法。

trans-unit.source: Passed to enable/disable to turn on/off dithering. Can also be used with getParameter to find the current dithering method.
trans-unit.target: 通过以 enable / disable 以打开/关闭抖动。也可以与 getParameter 一起使用以找到当前的抖动方法。

trans-unit.source: Passed to enable/disable to turn on/off the alpha to coverage. Used in multi-sampling alpha channels.
trans-unit.target: 通过以 enable / disable 以打开/关闭Alpha覆盖率。用于多采样Alpha通道。

trans-unit.source: Passed to enable/disable to turn on/off the depth test. Can also be used with getParameter to query the depth test.
trans-unit.target: 通过以 enable / disable 打开/关闭深度测试。也可以与 getParameter 一起使用以查询深度测试。

trans-unit.source: Passed to enable/disable to turn on/off the polygon offset. Useful for rendering hidden-line images, decals, and or solids with highlighted edges. Can also be used with getParameter to query the scissor test.
trans-unit.target: 传递以 enable / disable 以打开/关闭多边形偏移。用于渲染带有突出显示边缘的隐藏线图像，贴花和/或实体。也可以与 getParameter 一起使用以查询剪刀测试。

trans-unit.source: Passed to enable/disable to turn on/off the sample coverage. Used in multi-sampling.
trans-unit.target: 通过以 enable / disable 以打开/关闭样品覆盖率。用于多重采样。

trans-unit.source: Passed to enable/disable to turn on/off the scissor test. Can also be used with getParameter to query the scissor test.
trans-unit.target: 通过以 enable / disable 打开/关闭剪刀测试。也可以与 getParameter 一起使用以查询剪刀测试。

trans-unit.source: Passed to enable/disable to turn on/off the stencil test. Can also be used with getParameter to query the stencil test.
trans-unit.target: 通过以 enable / disable 以打开/关闭模板测试。也可以与 getParameter 一起使用以查询模板测试。

trans-unit.source: Passed to frontFace to specify the front face of a polygon is drawn in the clockwise direction
trans-unit.target: 传递给 frontFace 以指定多边形的正面按顺时针方向绘制

trans-unit.source: Passed to frontFace to specify the front face of a polygon is drawn in the counter clockwise direction
trans-unit.target: 传递到 frontFace 以指定多边形的正面沿逆时针方向绘制

trans-unit.source: Passed to getBufferParameter to get a buffer's size.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 getBufferParameter 以获取缓冲区的大小。

trans-unit.source: Passed to getBufferParameter to get the hint for the buffer passed in when it was created.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 getBufferParameter 以获得创建时传递的缓冲区的提示。

trans-unit.source: Passed to getParameter to determine if the depth write mask is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 getParameter 以确定是否启用深度写掩码。

trans-unit.source: Passed to getParameter to determine the current depth clear value.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 getParameter 以确定当前的深度清除值。

trans-unit.source: Passed to getParameter to determine the current value of frontFace. Should return CW or CCW.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 getParameter 以确定 frontFace 的当前值。应该返回 CW 或 CCW 。

trans-unit.source: Passed to getParameter to get the array buffer binding.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 getParameter 以获取数组缓冲区绑定。

trans-unit.source: Passed to getParameter to get the current lineWidth (set by the lineWidth method).
trans-unit.target: 传递给 getParameter 以获取当前的 lineWidth （由 lineWidth 方法设置）。

trans-unit.source: Passed to getParameter to get the current RGB blend function.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 getParameter 以获取当前的RGB混合函数。

trans-unit.source: Passed to getParameter to get the current RGB blend function. Same as BLEND_EQUATION
trans-unit.target: 传递给 getParameter 以获取当前的RGB混合函数。与BLEND_EQUATION相同

trans-unit.source: Passed to getParameter to get the current alpha blend function. Same as BLEND_EQUATION
trans-unit.target: 传递给 getParameter 以获取当前的alpha混合函数。与BLEND_EQUATION相同

trans-unit.source: Passed to getParameter to get the current depth function. Returns NEVER, ALWAYS, LESS, EQUAL, LEQUAL, GREATER, GEQUAL, or NOTEQUAL.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 getParameter 以获取当前的深度函数。返回 NEVER ， ALWAYS ， LESS ， EQUAL ， LEQUAL ， GREATER ， GEQUAL 或 NOTEQUAL 。

trans-unit.source: Passed to getParameter to get the current destination RGB blend function.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 getParameter 以获取当前的目标RGB混合函数。

trans-unit.source: Passed to getParameter to get the current destination alpha blend function.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 getParameter 以获取当前的目标alpha混合函数。

trans-unit.source: Passed to getParameter to get the current element array buffer.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 getParameter 以获取当前元素数组缓冲区。

trans-unit.source: Passed to getParameter to get the current size of a point drawn with gl.POINTS
trans-unit.target: 传递给 getParameter 以获取使用 gl.POINTS 绘制的点的当前大小

trans-unit.source: Passed to getParameter to get the current source alpha blend function.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 getParameter 以获取当前的源alpha混合函数。

trans-unit.source: Passed to getParameter to get the current stencil fail function should the depth buffer test fail. Should return KEEP, REPLACE, INCR, DECR, INVERT, INCR_WRAP, or DECR_WRAP.
trans-unit.target: 如果深度缓冲区测试失败，则传递给 getParameter 以获取当前的模具失败功能。应该返回 KEEP ， REPLACE ， INCR ， DECR ， INVERT ， INCR_WRAP 或 DECR_WRAP 。

trans-unit.source: Passed to getParameter to get the current stencil fail function should the depth buffer test pass. Should return KEEP, REPLACE, INCR, DECR, INVERT, INCR_WRAP, or DECR_WRAP.
trans-unit.target: 如果深度缓冲区测试通过，则传递给 getParameter 以获取当前的模具失效功能。应该返回KEEP，REPLACE，INCR，DECR，INVERT，INCR_WRAP或DECR_WRAP。

trans-unit.source: Passed to getParameter to get the current stencil fail function. Should return KEEP, REPLACE, INCR, DECR, INVERT, INCR_WRAP, or DECR_WRAP.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 getParameter 以获取当前的模具失效功能。应该返回 KEEP ， REPLACE ， INCR ， DECR ， INVERT ， INCR_WRAP 或 DECR_WRAP 。

trans-unit.source: Passed to getParameter to get the current stencil function. Returns NEVER, ALWAYS, LESS, EQUAL, LEQUAL, GREATER, GEQUAL, or NOTEQUAL.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 getParameter 以获取当前的模具功能。返回 NEVER ， ALWAYS ， LESS ， EQUAL ， LEQUAL ， GREATER ， GEQUAL 或 NOTEQUAL 。

trans-unit.source: Passed to getParameter to get the current value of cullFace. Should return FRONT, BACK, or FRONT_AND_BACK
trans-unit.target: 传递给 getParameter 以获取 cullFace 的当前值。应该返回 FRONT ， BACK 或 FRONT_AND_BACK

trans-unit.source: Passed to getParameter to get the range of available widths for a line. Returns a length-2 array with the lo value at 0, and hight at 1.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 getParameter 以获取一条线的可用宽度范围。返回一个长度为2的数组，其中lo值为0，高为1。

trans-unit.source: Passed to getParameter to get the reference value used for stencil tests.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 getParameter 以获取用于模板测试的参考值。

trans-unit.source: Passed to getParameter to get the renderer string of the graphics driver.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 getParameter 以获取图形驱动程序的渲染器字符串。

trans-unit.source: Passed to getParameter to get the value the stencil will be cleared to.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 getParameter 以获取将清除模板的值。

trans-unit.source: Passed to getParameter to get the vendor string of the graphics driver.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 getParameter 以获取图形驱动程序的供应商字符串。

trans-unit.source: Passed to getParameter to return a length-2 array of floats giving the current depth range.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 getParameter 以返回给定当前深度范围的长度为2的浮点数组。

trans-unit.source: Passed to getParameter to return a the current blend color.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 getParameter 以返回当前的混合颜色。

trans-unit.source: Passed to getProgramParameter after calling attachShader to determine if the shader was attached correctly. Returns false if errors occurred.
trans-unit.target: 调用 attachShader 确定着色器是否正确连接后，传递给 getProgramParameter 。如果发生错误，则返回false。

trans-unit.source: Passed to getProgramParameter after calling linkProgram to determine if a program was linked correctly. Returns false if there were errors. Use getProgramInfoLog to find the exact error.
trans-unit.target: 调用 linkProgram 确定程序是否正确链接后传递给 getProgramParameter 。如果有错误，则返回false。使用 getProgramInfoLog 查找确切的错误。

trans-unit.source: Passed to getProgramParameter after calling validateProgram to determine if it is valid. Returns false if errors were found.
trans-unit.target: 调用 validateProgram 确定是否有效后传递给 getProgramParameter 。如果发现错误，则返回false。

trans-unit.source: Passed to getProgramParameter to get the number of attributes active in a program.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 getProgramParameter 以获取程序中活动的属性数。

trans-unit.source: Passed to getProgramParamter to get the number of uniforms active in a program.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 getProgramParamter 以获取程序中活动的制服数量。

trans-unit.source: Passed to getShaderParamter to determine if a shader was deleted via deleteShader. Returns true if it was, false otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 getShaderParamter 以确定是否通过 deleteShader 删除了着色器。如果为true，则返回true，否则返回false。

trans-unit.source: Passed to getShaderParamter to get the status of the compilation. Returns false if the shader was not compiled. You can then query getShaderInfoLog to find the exact error
trans-unit.target: 传递给 getShaderParamter 以获取编译状态。如果未编译着色器，则返回false。然后，您可以查询 getShaderInfoLog 以查找确切的错误

trans-unit.source: Passed to getVertexAttrib to read back the current vertex attribute.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 getVertexAttrib 以读取当前的顶点属性。

trans-unit.source: Passed to texParameter to set the desired maximum anisotropy for a texture.
trans-unit.target: 传递给 texParameter 来设置纹理所需的最大各向异性。

trans-unit.source: Passing null to a method or parameter accepting a DOMString typically stringifies to "null".
trans-unit.target: 将 null 传递给接受 DOMString 的方法或参数通常会字符串化为 "null" 。

trans-unit.source: Passing a string instead of a function to setTimeout() suffers from the same hazards as using eval.
trans-unit.target: 将字符串而不是函数传递给 setTimeout() 具有与使用 eval. 相同的危害。

trans-unit.source: Passing a value of 0, an empty array, or an array containing all zeros will cancel any currently ongoing vibration pattern.
trans-unit.target: 传递值 0 ，空数组或包含全零的数组将取消任何当前正在进行的振动模式。

trans-unit.source: Passing an empty array will throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 传递一个空数组将抛出一个异常。

trans-unit.source: Passing an invalid ID to clearTimeout() silently does nothing; no exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 将无效的ID传递给 clearTimeout() 不会执行任何操作；没有异常被抛出。

trans-unit.source: Payload Length: If this value is between 0 and 125, then it is the length of message. If it is 126, the following 2 bytes (16-bit unsigned integer) are the length. If it is 127, the following 8 bytes (64-bit unsigned integer) are the length.
trans-unit.target: 有效载荷长度。如果这个值在0到125之间,那么它就是信息的长度。如果是126,则下面的2个字节(16位无符号整数)为长度,如果是127,则下面的8个字节(64位无符号整数)为长度。如果是127,则下面的8个字节(64位无符号整数)为长度。

trans-unit.source: Payment Request concepts and usage
trans-unit.target: 付款请求的概念和用法

trans-unit.source: Payment Request data
trans-unit.target: 付款请求数据

trans-unit.source: Payment handlers are identified by payment method identifiers, which are strings uniquely identifying the payment handler. These may be either one of the standardized payment handler identifiers, or a URL used by the payment processing service to both identify itself and to handle payments.
trans-unit.target: 付款处理程序由付款方式标识符标识，该标识符是唯一标识付款处理程序的字符串。这些可以是标准化付款处理程序标识符之一，也可以是付款处理服务用来标识自己和处理付款的URL。

trans-unit.source: Payment method identifiers
trans-unit.target: 付款方式识别码

trans-unit.target: 支付处理概念
